author: pdteam

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 41142
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;sample-next-app.fabrique.social.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 41142
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 0

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;sample-next-app.fabrique.social.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
fabrique.social.gouv.fr.	300	IN	SOA	ns1-06.azure-dns.com. azuredns-hostmaster.microsoft.com. 1 3600 300 2419200 300
